title: Why Aren't There More Republicans In Games Media? - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 127 (Pt. 4)
description:
Colin Moriarty wants to know why there is such an in balance of politics in games media.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: Kinda Funny Live 2 is happening May 28th and 29th, it's a 2-day event. The first day is going to be a completely ridiculous stage show; what we have planned this year completely blows last year out of the water, and I don't even know how that's possible because we were really stupid last year, and this year's somehow even stupider. Day two is going to be a full day of meet and greets; we're hanging out with all of us, a bunch of Rooster Teeth people are there, Funhaus people are there, Achievement Hunter it's going to be a grand old time; there's going to be some games to play, there's going to be signings; it's it's exciting, it's a really fun time; there's going to be exclusive merch. Oh yeah, there's definitely going to be exclusive merch.
